post:
Hello Everyone,

The Premier Host has launched a line of VDS's to fit everyone's needs and budgets!

The Premier Host currently operates a network with 390Gbps connectivity to the internet. There are 2 separate fiber entry points for complete IP transport redundancy. Our core network uses BGP4 routing protocol - our bandwidth is %100 multi-homed Our network supports both IPv4 and IPv6 protocols.

Our current available VDS's are:

VDS1:
300GB Hard Drive
256MB RAM
1 IP
10Mbps Unmetered

14.95/mo<br />

VDS2
500GB Hard Drive
512MB RAM
5 IP's
20Mbps Unmetered
$39.00/mo

VDS3

500GB Hard Drive
2GB RAM
5 IP's
30Mbps Unmetered
$59.00/mo

We can provide additional IP's for $2/mo per IP.

We also have discounts for WHMSonic, Softaculous, and more.

View and order at: http://www.thepremierhost.com/vds.html

Best regards,
Jerry
